law.text: No provision in KRS Chapter 18A shall be construed to preclude any classified or unclassified state employee from appealing to the personnel board any action alleged to be in violation of laws prohibiting discrimination based on a person's status as a qualified individual with a disability, sex, age, religion, or race or national origin, in accordance with this chapter.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 378, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 282, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 494, sec. 27, effective July 15, 1986.
